original_text: I will open rivers in high places, and fountains in the midst of the valleys: I will make the wilderness a pool of water, and the dry land springs of water.
korean_text: 내가 헐벗은 산에 강을 내며 골짜기 가운데에 샘이 나게 하며 광야가 못이 되게 하며 마른 땅이 샘 근원이 되게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: I will open rivers in high places
and fountains in the midst of the valleys
I will make the wilderness a pool of water
and the dry land springs of water
